snippet: We find the characters trying to make sense of what they've discovered about one another, as well as a shocking family tie. Andrew Kuo unravels the latest web of relationships.
abstract: We find the characters trying to make sense of what they've discovered about one another, as well as a shocking family tie. Andrew Kuo unravels the latest web of relationships.

headline.main: Charting R. Kelly's 'Trapped in the Closet'
